content: Yes, "Exile on Main St." is widely considered to be one of The Rolling Stones' greatest and most influential albums. The album features a wide range of musical styles and captures the band's raw energy and emotion. It was recorded in several different locations, including some non-traditional studio spaces, which added to the album's unique sound and feel. "Exile on Main St." has continued to resonate with fans and has inspired many musicians over the years.
